title: nine nODi
sahitya:
,,ninne nOdi danyanaade- |



no he! shreenivaasaa ||



,,ninne nOdi danyanaade- |



no ... ||







anupallavi







,,pakshi vaahana lakshmee ramaNaa ||



,,lakshya vittu nOdO paandu ||



,,paksha sarva daitya siksha ||



rakshisanna kamalaakshaa ||



(ninne)







caraNam







,,dEsha dEsha tiriginaanu ||



,,aasha baddha naade swaami ||



,,daasanenisi enna jaga- ||



,,deesha kaayO vaasudEvaa ||



antaranga daasa yannu



antara villa dE paalisayya



hantakaari purandara viThalana ||



(ninne)
